description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Jewel Fever" is an addictive match-3-puzzle-game.  It features: - Three game modes: Normal, Quick and Infinite - HD graphics   Instructions: Normal mode - you advance to the next level when you match the required number of jewels!  Quick mode - Try to match as many jewels as you can in 60 seconds!  Infinite mode - You have unlimited time so you won´t be surprised by "game over"!
